Name: Portfolio
Description: Portfolio is a personal website designed to present my professional journey, offering a detailed view of my work experience, educational achievements, technical skills, and personal projects.

Name: CashFlow
Description: CashFlow is a web application designed to simplify personal finance management by helping users record, monitor, and analyze income, expenses, account balances, and financial categories with ease.

Name: GymLog
Description: GymLog is a fitness app tailored for planning, tracking, and analyzing workouts, allowing users to create detailed routines with exercises, sets, reps, and rest intervals.

Name: TaskMaster
Description: TaskMaster is a task and project management system that uses a Kanban board to visually track task progress, prioritize work, and adapt to evolving project requirements.

Name: Poseidon
Description: Poseidon is a maritime monitoring system leveraging machine learning to detect illegal activities like smuggling and illegal fishing, enhancing security and protecting marine ecosystems.

Name: Reupload
Description: Reupload is an image-sharing social media platform where users can upload and share images, explore creative content, and connect with others in an inspiring online community.

Name: Warforce
Description: Warforce is a desktop application built for military operations, empowering commanders to efficiently manage personnel, organize platoons, and streamline military workflows.

Name: OneShop
Description: OneShop is a web-based marketplace connecting users and merchants, enabling seamless product browsing, secure purchasing, and inventory management for sellers.

Name: MotoRider
Description: MotorRider is a web application for motorcycle inventory and rental management, designed for enthusiasts and businesses to simplify operations in one central platform.

Name: Football Manager
Description: Football Manager is a desktop game where two players create, manage, and compete with their custom football teams in strategic and engaging matches.

Name: AirCheap
Description: AirCheap is a web application for budget-conscious travelers to find affordable airfare options by searching flights based on origin and destination IATA codes.

Name: VisualQuake
Description: VisualQuake is a web app providing an interactive map interface to explore global earthquake data, allowing users to visualize seismic activity worldwide.

Name: Invoice Manager
Description: Invoice Manager is an application designed to streamline invoice creation, tracking, and management, making billing processes efficient for businesses of all sizes.

Name: Vehicle Manager
Description: Vehicle Manager is a comprehensive app for tracking and managing vehicle data such as mileage, maintenance, and inventory, suitable for fleets, dealerships, and individuals.

Name: SisanjeHR
Description: SisanjeHR offers a dual-application hair salon management system, with desktop tools for salon operations and a web app for customer booking and discovery.

Name: Football Statistics WC 2018
Description: Football Statistics World Cup 2018 is a dual-desktop application providing detailed team stats, player profiles, and match summaries from the 2018 tournament.

Name: Password Encoder
Description: Password Encoder is a desktop application for securely encrypting passwords using the SHA256 algorithm, generating robust, irreversible 256-bit hashes for enhanced security.

Name: NASA
Description: NASA is a mobile app that allows users to log experiences with stunning space imagery provided by the National Aeronautics and Space Administration for an inspiring experience.
